page.title: 03BARNSTON SCHOOL,Who are we?
page.content: This school caters for children in the {5-11 age range.}In July 1985 there are 281 pupils on roll. 52% of the pupils are boys and 48% are girls. 40% are infants,28% are lower juniors and 32% are upper juniors. Infants are in the 5-7 age group,lower juniors 8-9 and upper juniors 10-11 age group. The children enter school in the year in which they are 5,older pupils in September and younger ones in January. The{average attendance}for the week ending July 12 1985 was 270. This year the{tallest}boy is 172cm, the tallest girl is 164cm.The {shortest}boy is 109cm and the shortest girl is 104cm.
